title: Galanz GLCMKZ09BKR09 Retro Countertop Microwave Oven with Auto Cook & Reheat, Defrost, Quick Start Functions, Easy Clean with Glass Turntable, Pull Handle, 0.9 cu ft, Black
description: The Galanz Retro Countertop Microwave Oven makes cooking and reheating meals or beverages simple, quick, and convenient while adding a fun and stylish addition to any kitchen, rec room, home office or dorm room. Defrost any of your frozen foods by either weight or time; Also includes a quick start, +30 seconds button for when you need additional cooking time for your meal. LED Display and easy to use push buttons include 7 Auto Cooking programs and 10 Auto Reheat Programs making cooking and reheating meals and beverages simple, quick, easy & convenient! Removable for easy clean up, the Galanz Retro Countertop Microwave Oven includes a 10.5" glass turntable that rotates 360 degrees for even and efficient cooking. Vintage and retro look will accentuate any space! Mix and match with the other retro appliances from Galanz like the toaster oven, freezer, & refrigeration pieces. The compact size is perfect for apartments, kitchenettes, dorms, and other small kitchen spaces - Measures 19.0" W x 14.9" D x 10.80" H with a capacity of 0.9 cu ft.
